title: Citizen Jane: A True Story of Money, Murder, and one Woman's Mission to Put a Killer Behind Bars
description: Tom O'Donnell had been living off the graces of Jane Alexander for six years, regaling her with his charm and also borrowing money extensively. He would do anything for money--even murder Jane's 88-year-old aunt. After he fled with more than $10,000 of her money, Jane was determined to put him behind bars. This is her story. of photos.
author: James Dalessandro
